snippet: Mexico began airlifting hundreds of stranded tourists to Mexico City from Acapulco after a tropical storm flooded highways, the airport and some hotels.
lead_paragraph: Mexico began airlifting hundreds of stranded tourists to Mexico City from Acapulco after a tropical storm flooded highways, the airport and some hotels.

headline.main: Mexico: Stranded Tourists Airlifted From Acapulco
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Stranded Tourists Airlifted From Acapulco
